content: Pretty good! Just finished a big project.
Nice work! By the way, the team meeting is scheduled for 2pm tomorrow.
Awesome, I'll be there. Also, the client proposal deadline is next Friday, March 15th.
Got it, I'll make sure everything is ready by then.
Sounds good! Looking forward to wrapping this up.
Quick question - has anyone confirmed the budget for the new office space?
Hey, quick reminder - the team meeting tomorrow is at 3pm, not 2pm. Location is the main conference room.
Thanks for the heads up! I'll update my calendar.
No problem! Looking forward to it.
Alright, I'm heading out now. Need to finish my part for the March 22nd deadline.
Wait, are you sure about that deadline date?
